sentences.cn: 一个腼腆的矮个子男人

sentences.en: And the rest are like herbivores: meek, diminutive, and quick to start.
sentences.cn: 和其余的人一样, 小型食草动物: 柔顺, 并且很快就开始了.

sentences.en: Despite its diminutive size, the car is quite comfortable.
sentences.cn: 尽管这辆车很小, 但相当舒服.

sentences.en: Diminutive innovation lab is the breeding ground of innovation product.
sentences.cn: 小型的创新实验室是创新产品的温床.
他是一位身材矮小的司令官.

sentences.en: Kurt had never been afraid of these diminutive aliens.
sentences.cn: 库尔特从来没怕过这些小外星人.

sentences.en: Luciana vanished aboard one of the diminutive green vehicles.
sentences.cn: 露西安娜闪身上了一辆绿色的小型汽车不见了.

sentences.en: Past retirement age, the diminutive Dr. Lin is as vivacious as ever.
sentences.cn: 身体瘦小的林大夫,虽然已过了退休年龄, 可是她和过去一样,仍精力充沛.

sentences.en: Slight dalliance with her makes the very diminutive seem as big as life.
sentences.cn: 与她稍作嬉戏就会使无足轻重的小事变得性命攸关.

sentences.en: Sue is a diminutive of Susan.
The diminutive suffix - ling in " duckling " denotes affection.
sentences.cn: "duckling " (小鸭子)中意指"小"的字尾-ling表示亲昵.

sentences.en: The diminutive, white - haired was deeply troubled.
sentences.cn: 矮个子的白发老人感到非常为难.

sentences.en: The women of the south are diminutive, subservient and very polite.
sentences.cn: 南方的妇女娇小可爱, 毕恭毕敬,很有礼貌.

sentences.en: These ponies are diminutive in size but hard as nails.
sentences.cn: 这些小马个子不大,却很结实.

sentences.en: We thought her diminutive figure could not suffer that work.
sentences.cn: 我们认为她那小小的身材不能忍受那项工作.

words.tran_cn: 爱称；指小词；身材极小的人

trans.tran_cn: 极小的人[物]，爱称，昵称，指小词
trans.tran_en: a word formed by adding a diminutive suffix
